unnormalised: E he bhai, inij-thao-ko-jokhoj-a-se-em-chaka-keda? Ona-do-chhet-ge-langa-re-menak-a - Atu Rampur, Post Office Mirzapur, Zila Azamgarh, UP, Pin Code 276121. Hulung-do-DTDC-ko-men-keda 'ona-thao-do-ba-ko-jokhoj-a' - purai-somoy-barbad-len-a! Hatara-lagi-inj-jojoma-ag-en-inj-mu-re-thir-le-khan-bes-a, se?
normalised:
E re mit', onko do injren elaḳare ko jala daṛea'a se ban ona chekam nirakh akada?
Ona do kichhu dur re mena'a - Ato Rampur, Dakghar Mirzapur, Zila Azamgarh, U.P., Pincode bar eay choroy mit' bar mit'.
Horat' dhao D.T.D.C. ko lai let'a 'elaḳare saman rohor ban hoey daṛea'a' - purai somoy chatka let'a!
Aḍi bes' do hoeyok'a joḍi am do nirakh keda inj do saman rohor lagit' injren jojana inj aagu lekhan, ena?
text: E he bhai, inij-thao-ko-jokhoj-a-se-em-chaka-keda? Ona-do-chhet-ge-langa-re-menak-a - Atu Rampur, Post Office Mirzapur, Zila Azamgarh, UP, Pin Code 276121. Hulung-do-DTDC-ko-men-keda 'ona-thao-do-ba-ko-jokhoj-a' - purai-somoy-barbad-len-a! Hatara-lagi-inj-jojoma-ag-en-inj-mu-re-thir-le-khan-bes-a, se?
